{{Infobox weapon poe2
| name              = Min's Fortune
| icon              = poe2 sabre_mins-fortune_icon.png
| description       = The brash smuggler Min Felinco earned her reputation by taking risks and always landing on her feet. Running blockades and evading Vailian customs ships were worthy challenges and Min took great pleasure in constantly pushing her luck. She commanded countless sloops, ketches, and caravels over her career transporting valuable contraband and always insisted on flying her personal colors, which depicted a cat with a mocking grin.

When her countless pursuers inevitably caught up to her, it only heightened her thrill. She enjoyed few things as much as honest swashbuckling. To that end she wielded this sabre in many fights and narrow escapes. While she was not overburdened with many personal possessions, she prized the blade, and cared for it lovingly.
